channel.title: coffeescript on Choly's Blog

item.title: CoffeeScript
item.description: I just spent the last 5 hours learning CoffeeScript and I feel like I have pretty much everything down. My brain is kinda dead right now, but at the same time I’m pretty excited to actually try it in a real project. In case you don’t know CoffeeScript is a python-esque language which ‘compiles’ into javascript. classes, list comprehension inheritance, ranges, semantic code etc…. dream come true. http://jashkenas.github.com/coffee-script/ One thing I was worried about was being able to use 3rd party libraries with it.
